sentences.sContent: Such forage fish already account for nearly a fifth of the world’s total annual catch; another fifth goes to feed pigs and poultry.
sentences.sContent_eng: Such forage fish already account for nearly a fifth of the world’s total annual catch; another fifth goes to feed pigs and poultry.
sentences.sCn: 这样的饲料鱼已经差不多占每年世界总捕鱼量的五分之一；另有五分之一被用于喂猪和家禽。

sentences.sContent: Do notlet animals graze until you are notified that forage in your area is safe.
sentences.sContent_eng: Do notlet animals graze until you are notified that forage in your area is safe.
sentences.sCn: 得到你所在区域的饲料安全的通知前，不要让动物吃青草。

trans.tranOther: food supplies for horses and cattle
